titulo: I spoke with Arm about PC gaming and was told that Windows software compatibility is 'largely a solved problem'
descricao: NewsBut the future of Windows on Arm gaming will depend on developers.

titulo: Even when he's meant to be talking about watches, Henry Cavill's downright giddy over producing Warhammer 40k's upcoming Amazon series, says it's 'a challenge I'm enjoying enormously'
descricao: NewsDo what you love, and you'll never work a day in your life.

titulo: The Witcher 4's horses are so stunningly detailed they drove a real-life expert to happy tears: 'Oh my god they’re taking the horse seriously'
descricao: NewsKelpie has the equestrian community seal of approval so far.

titulo: Randy Pitchford has concluded that 'Borderlands 3 is better than Borderlands 2' after looking at a Twitter poll, but Borderlands 4 will be the best, for sure
descricao: NewsI'm not sure playtime always equates to enjoyment.

titulo: It's not an April Fool's joke anymore: Zotac goes ahead with its 'gamer fragrance' perfume, for a limited few, for a limited time
descricao: NewsClean, woody, and aquatic. Doesn't shout 'gamer' to me.

titulo: The absence of Marvel's Blade during the Xbox Games Showcase has left me worried about Arkane—after a rough couple of years it needs a win
descricao: NewsAll we got from Bethesda this year was fishing. Not a vampire in sight.

titulo: 'MSI Afterburner is a bit PowerColor Afterburner now' as the dev had to buy another manufacturer's GPU to build support for AMD's RDNA 4 graphics cards into the next beta
descricao: NewsNo MSI RDNA 4 cards means no MSI RDNA 4 hardware for the Afterburner dev.

titulo: Atlus promises it hasn't forgotten how to make new Persona games, says it's 'actively preparing for' something I'd bet money is Persona 6
descricao: NewsJust in case you were a little dismayed to head back to Inaba.

titulo: Move over Ashcroft, Resident Evil 9 will have its T-virus poster boy back in the limelight according to notable Resi leaker: 'Leon Kennedy is not the only playable character but he is the main character'
descricao: NewsLeon's never too far away from the action.
